facebook.title: Free breathing myocardial perfusion data sets for performance analysis of motion compensation...

peer_reviews.title: Free breathing myocardial perfusion data sets for performance analysis of motion compensation algorithms
peer_reviews.summary:
In general this is an interesting proof of concept article that provides useful tools for the community. It should be published. However, the usability of the tools needs adjustment before publication - please see below. 
My recommendation is to accept aft

peer_reviews.title: Free breathing myocardial perfusion data sets for performance analysis of motion compensation algorithms
peer_reviews.summary:
All my concerns were addressed. The Title should be changed to something like "Free Breathing Myocardial Perfusion..." 
Regarding the data and scripts, we were unable to run the algorithms. Here is some feedback from the person who spent some time on this:

page 1, Abtract, Conclusion: 
… to reliable compare… should be … to reliably compare…

the sentence A typical imaging protocol usually acquires… does not read well. Please reformulate.
